timeline.bodyText: Just curious, what block uses this?
timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Cobwebs and the nether vines....which makes me realize there's a slight error here. it should be silk touch OR shears. Fixed in latest commit.
replies.author: Prospector

replies.bodyText: it's what the class is called.

replies.bodyText: Ah, thought the return type is the built type, not the self type.

timeline.bodyText: I know this is a vanilla-inspired name, but EXPLOSION_IMMUNE is a little confusing imo, however I can't think of a better name either so I guess it's fine, especially since it's one commonly seen in the json anyway
timeline.author: Earthcomputer
